  1. Introduction

    gcc -c -g -Wa,-a,-ad [other GCC options] foo.c > foo.lst

    Analyze: this delay is based on while a loop.

    int i = 0; while(i <s; 256){ i++; } ; opcode dst, src main: mov r17, 0; mov r18, 0xff .LOOP: cmp r17, r18 jle Main inc r17 jmp .LOOP:
